issue.title: [Dev][CI] "ci/scripts/install_osx_sdk.sh" unused
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17555](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17555). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`ci/scripts/install_osx_sdk.sh` was once used on Travis macOS CI, but it has been unused for a long time.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17555?focusedCommentId=17597396) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13996 also fixed this.
